About the Online Application Form 2024

Admission Eligibility

Application Deadline:

How to Apply Online.

 

About the Online Application Form 2024

The Sekhukhune TVET College application form 2024, steps on how to apply online, general admission entry requirements, application (registration) dates, departmental brochures, tenders, fees, open day, term dates, prospectus download in PDF, and closing dates for 2024 admission enrollment are published here online

The Sekhukhune TVET College online applications 2024 is opened for prospective students who wish to apply for admission into various Undergraduate, Postgraduate, Masters’s, Diploma, Certificate, Short Courses, Distance Learning, and other programmes courses offered at Sekhukhune TVET College for the 2024 academic year.

Admission Eligibility

It is important to know that Sekhukhune TVET College applications 2024 are opened for both South Africans and interested foreign applicants (International Student) can apply for the online application 2024 provided he/she has met the admission criteria for the 2024 Intake registration.

Application Deadline:

Also note that once the Online Application 2024 is closed, new applications will not be submitted. Prospective students are to register now while the online application form 2024 is still open.

How to Apply Online.

The Application is made by filling the form online at the Sekhukhune TVET College admission application portal.

  1. CLICK HERE to visit the Sekhukhune TVET College registration portal
  2. Select Admission Forms Link
  3. Select the Admissions Form Type
  4. Enter your details
  5. Submit application
  6. Pay all necessary application fees

For more information and inquiries, you can contact the Sekhukhune TVET College by visiting the official website or campus.

Please use the comment section for your queries regarding Online Application Form 2024.
